Data Visualization

During my time as a UI designer and front end developer I've been playing around with data visualization using D3. Information presented in a spreadsheet format can be hard for me to digest but with data visualization, they can be outstanding fuel for visual communication.

Captives Scorecard

An interactive visual graphic communicating complex data in a quick and digestible way, this scorecard is a mini-dashboard + infographic.

Flood Map

Taken from a collection of datasets from both Marsh and FEMA, I was able to condense 20 years of flood data into one interactive geographical map.

Interactive Charts

Marsh was looking for a more engaging was to present charts. Here I replicated charts created by designers to be interactive. One of the main benefits of such frameworks like D3 is the ability to allow the user to discover various aspects of the data.

To see more of my D3 work,
visit my bl.ocks page.
